TopicTitle: What do you think about Lumosity brain enhance program?

Articles.Content:
Do anybody use this.

I read about this program in a scientific journal.

I always had problem with math. I'm master student of Library Science at University Of Wroclaw, Poland.

I looking for something that increase my cognitive brain function. I showed Lumosity to my brother and he liked it to, he had some problems because he is not good in English.

I and my brother thinking about buy family plan(up to five members) it's 79.95 USD per year.

And here is problem we are Polish we don't earn as much as American or British( especially my i'm only had my university scholarship) We can find find additional 3 person to share cost.

But does the Lumosity is really improving cognitive functions?

I read some articles in Ebscohost database at my university. But It can be sponsored article,

Can you recommend my good brain enhance techniques. I'm especially interested in math skills.
